Davis David Data Scientist & CEO, Parrotai

Tupokigwe Isagah Director (Parrotai), Lecturer (Mzumbe University), Parrotai & Mzumbe University

Anthony Faustine PhD machine learning researcher, University of Ghent(Belgium), Parrotai & IDLab, imec

Faustine is a PhD machine learning researcher at IDLab research group of Ghent University since October 2017, advised by Tom Dhaene and Dirk Deschrijver. His research interest lie in the application of machine intelligence for computational sustainability with a focus on statistical-learning, deep-learning, bayesian inference and signal processing. He is currently investigating robust machine learning methods for energy-disaggregation.
